data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 2, New York advance rapidly upfield but Rosendo Mendoza blows for offside.
Lassi Lappalainen for Montreal drives towards goal at Red Bull Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
In the minute 4, Bojan Krkic puts the ball in the net and the away team now lead 0-1.
Great play from Victor Wanyama to set up the goal.
New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a throw-in for Montreal, close to New York's area.
Tom Barlow (New York) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 8, New York have been awarded a corner by Rosendo Mendoza.
Throw-in high up the field for Montreal in Harrison.
Throw-in for Montreal in the half of New York.
In the minute 10, New York have been awarded a corner by Rosendo Mendoza.
Ball safe as Montreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
New York's Daniel Royer is whistled for offside at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 14, Tom Barlow is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
That's a fine assist from Mandela Egbo.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
In the minute 16, New York pushes forward through Tom Barlow, whose finish on goal is saved.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Montreal in the half of New York.
In the minute 18, It's a goal kick for the home team in Harrison.
Rosendo Mendoza blows against Montreal's Lassi Lappalainen for offside.
Throw-in for New York close to the penalty box.
In the minute 21, Lassi Lappalainen gets his shot on target but fails to score for Montreal.
Rosendo Mendoza awards the home team a throw-in.
Montreal will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from New York.
In the minute 24, Can New York capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Montreal have a goal kick.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 26, Throw-in New York.
Ball goes out of play for a New York goal kick.
Can New York capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montreal's half?
In the minute 29, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Montreal close to the penalty box.
Samuel Piette (Montreal) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
In the minute 31, Montreal to take a throw-in in New York territory.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for New York!
In the minute 35, New York take a 2-1 lead thanks to Tom Barlow.
Daniel Royer with an assist there.
Rosendo Mendoza awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 36, Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
At Red Bull Arena, Luis Binks has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In Harrison, Lassi Lappalainen of Montreal is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for New York in their own half.
Montreal have a dangerous throw-in.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Florian Valot for New York who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
In the minute 40, New Yorkâ€™s Florian Valot is on his feet again at Red Bull Arena.
Montreal are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Montreal needs to be cautious. New York have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 45, Rosendo Mendoza signals a New York throw-in in Montreal's half.
Throw-in for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
Important block from the Montreal defence as Kaku fires in a strike for New York.
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Harrison.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a Montreal throw-in in New York's half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
In the minute 46, Rosendo Mendoza has blown to start the second-half.
New York awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to New York.
In the minute 47, Florian Valot (New York) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
New York have been awarded a corner by Rosendo Mendoza.
Rosendo Mendoza awards Montreal a goal kick.
In the minute 48, Montreal to take a throw-in in New York territory.
Can New York capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montreal's half?
Goal kick for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
In the minute 50, Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Throw-in for New York in the half of Montreal.
New York needs to be cautious. Montreal have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 53, Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York's half?
Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to Montreal.
Free kick Montreal.
In the minute 54, At Red Bull Arena, Montreal are penalized for being offside.
Goal kick for Montreal at Red Bull Arena.
Goal! Daniel Royer extends New York's lead to 3-1.
In the minute 56, Kaku instrumental with a fine assist.
Goal! New York extend their lead to 4-1 through Kaku.
That's a fine assist from Daniel Royer.
In the minute 58, Amar Sejdic is replacing Maciel for the away team.
The home team replace Mandela Egbo with Jason Pendant.
The home team have replaced Florian Valot with Dru Yearwood. This is the first substitution made today by Bradley Carnell.
In the minute 60, New York surge into the attack at Red Bull Arena but Daniel Royerâ€™s header is off-target.
Montreal have a goal kick.
Throw-in Montreal.
In the minute 61, Montreal push upfield but Rosendo Mendoza quickly pulls them for offside.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for New York close to the penalty box.
In the minute 63, Ball safe as Montreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Harrison Montreal attack through Amar Sejdic. The finish is off target, however.
Rosendo Mendoza awards New York a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Tom Barlow for New York gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
Samuel Tetteh is on a sub for Tom Barlow for New York.
In the minute 66, Bradley Carnell is making the team's fourth substitution at Red Bull Arena with Omir Fernandez replacing Jared Stroud.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Throw-in for New York in their own half.
In the minute 68, Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
Montreal awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 72, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
In Harrison a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 74, New York are pushing forward but Samuel Tetteh's finish is wide of the goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Harrison.
Free kick New York.
In the minute 76, Throw-in for Montreal in the half of New York.
New York are caught offside.
Cristian Casseres Jr of New York gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 81, Rosendo Mendoza awards Montreal a goal kick.
Mathias Jorgensen is replacing Kaku for New York at Red Bull Arena.
Throw-in Montreal.
In the minute 83, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Ball safe as New York is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 87, Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to New York in their own half.
Rosendo Mendoza signals a free kick to New York just outside Montreal's area.
New York drive upfield and Samuel Tetteh gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Montreal defender.
New York have been awarded a corner by Rosendo Mendoza.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Can New York get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
In Harrison, Montreal push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
New York drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
The second-half is over. The match ends 4-1.
Luis Binks (Montreal) sees red and is sent off in Harrison!
